column4: im bored and need something to do any1 need any help or have an idea of a way to pass the time on the comp? will some1 tell me some good links to read up on ubuntu besides the wiki and ubuntu websites?
ok blackwire38 any idea on where to start thats a pretty broad topic
start a project. pick a problem and solve it with a program.. then give it to the rest of us ;)
hrm. well i guess if your coding skills are already pretty solid, you should start by reading up on the standardized way to do stuff. http://www.gnu.org/prep/standards/
